item.title: Linux on the 17" MacBook Pro 8.3
item.description: Sometimes things seem like they were more natural in the past. I used to run a variety of distros’ on my old Late 2011 17” Apple Macbook Pro with little hassle. I'm pretty convinced this old thing is one of the best machines ever made for doing serious work on; a fantastic 16:10 Screen, an excellent keyboard, and with no vents on the bottom to inhale cat hair. GPU issues aside, its been solid, so perhaps the lack of bottom vents wasn't such a good idea after all.
